content: युध् {c4c} <ab>A.</ab> (युध्यते, युद्ध) {@--1@} To fight, struggle, contend with, wage war; <ls>Bg. 1. 23</ls>; <ls>Bk. 5. 101.</ls> {@--2@} To conquer or overcome in fight. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (योधयति-ते) {@--1@} To cause to fight. {@--2@} To oppose or encounter in fight with; <ls>R. 12. 50.</ls> {@--3@} To vanquish, conquer. {%--<ab>Desid.</ab>%} (युयुत्सते) To wish to fight. --WITH नि to wrestle, box. --प्रति to encounter in fight, oppose.
युध् {%<ab>f.</ab>%} War, battle, fight, contest; निघातयिष्यन्युधि यातुधानान् <ls>Bk. 2. 21</ls>; सदसि वाक्पटुता युधि विक्रमः <ls>Bh. 2. 63.</ls> {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} A hero, soldier.
